name: Koegler Electronics
overview:
Seeking VC/PE or Short Term Loan US$ 5M for “The Next Big Thing”! Biz Plan Like this from Apple Inc, HighEnd Pro/Biz Tablet PC-TV 17” FullHD, Ready to Manufacture and Market! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ http://www.koegler.tw/module-tab.html ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Finance Experts, Execs Headhunters, BizPartners etc. Please connect ;-) and/or contact 4koegler(at)gmail.com . Technology and Business are both my Passions. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ At a Glance: all Operations from Design to Markets of 4C Products! (Computing Products, Consumer Electronics, Communication Products, Car Electronics)

The flagship high end Koegler 17” Tablet PC is worldwide the only mobile solution which allows enterprise and prosumers creating content with common desktop software (office suite, design application) and viewing content in full page mode, portrait or landscape, additionally to navigation and television features. In the car, on the go, in public transportation, at soho or at customers location, enjoy the power and software of desktop PCs, over 3 times more viewing area, 20 times more storage as common tablets all handsfree due to our wearable frontholder !

http://www.koegler.tw/module-tab.html - Importers, Distributors, BtoB Customers Welcome!

Allways interested in Partnership: http://www.koegler.tw/module-Career.html Electronic Hardware and Software Experts, Down to Earth Entrepreneurs not those who talk about, but those who execute. Add/subscribe/like facebook profile/page ;), product photos etc. are there. http://www.fb.com/BruKoe - http://www.fb.com/KoePad

Specialties ~~~~~~~~~ Amazing Portable LCD Products LCD-PC, LCD PC-TV, LCD Mediaplayer, LCD Thin-Client, 22” and 26” Full HD+ ;-) 1920x1200, Ergonomic with easy Pivot in Portrait modus, Ecological; easy to Repair. Mobile similar Products, same 1920x1200 resolution, 15” to 20”. Digital engines, miniPC, set top boxes. All around portable or mobile solutions of convergence of computers and electronics, high end multimedia products for business and leisure. BtoB Customers, Importers, Distributors Welcome!
